Citing AutoProfÂ¶

If you use AutoProf for a project that leads to a publication, whether directly or as a dependency of another package, please include the following acknowledgment:

This research made use of AutoProf, a package for galaxy image
photometry (Stone et al. 2021).

The full record can be found here (ads link). And a BibTex entry is supplied here:

@software{Stone2021,
author       = {Connor Stone and
                Nikhil Arora and
                Stephane Courteau and
                Jean-Charles Cuillandre},
title        = {AutoProf - I. An automated non-parametric light profile pipeline for modern galaxy surveys},
month        = June,
year         = 2021,
publisher    = {arXiv},
doi          = {link},
url          = {link}
}
